name: Beach Match 3
description:
Beach Match 3 is fun in the sun. Work your way across the tropical islands as you switch and match beach balls to create 3 in a row, match 4 or even more. Complete the goal for each level without running out of moves to progress. Completely free to play and not overloaded with ads.

Updated frequently to add new levels and improve the game.

Leader-boards on special levels to see how you compare to friends and competitors.
